snippet: Dr. Rimoin made major discoveries on skeletal disorders and helped develop large-scale testing for inherited diseases.
abstract: David L Rimoin, geneticist who made major discoveries in the study of dwarfism and skeletal disorders and helped develop large-scale testing for inherited diseases, dies at age 75.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Rimoin made major discoveries on skeletal disorders and helped develop large-scale testing for inherited diseases.

headline.seo: David L. Rimoin, Expert on Dwarfism, Dies at 75
headline.main: David L. Rimoin, Geneticist and Expert on Dwarfism, Dies at 75
headline.print_headline: David L. Rimoin, Geneticist and Expert on Dwarfism, Is Dead at 75
